description: {"blocks":[{"key":"44m09","text":"Understanding how genetic variation alters gene expression - how genotype affects phenotype - is a central challenge in biology. To address this question in complex cell mixtures, we developed Direct Nuclear Tagmentation and RNA-sequencing (DNTR-seq), which enables whole genome and mRNA sequencing jointly in single cells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
